column5: Majority of a group's nutritional intake comes from terrestrial animal resources
Majority of a group's nutritional intake comes from terrestrial plant resources
Majority of a group's nutritional intake comes from aquatic resources

Normal HGF group: at time of contact, subsistence was based exclusively on hunting, gathering and/or fishing. No domesticated resources were exploited, except perhas the dog or plant substance such as tobacco.
Suspect: altrough the group may be organized similarly to hunter-gatherer-fishers, some subsistence may come from exchanges with non-HGF groups
Group is mobile and moves entire population from camp to camp as they go about the subsistence round
Group is completely sedentary or group moves into and out of a central location that is maintained for more than one year
Local autonomy with performance-based leadership, leaders are acknowledged
